© A. Gómez Pérez, M.C. Suárez-Figueroa, B. Villazón
19
Ontological Engineering
Reusing Ontologies as a Whole
Ontology Reuse is redefined as the activity of using ontologies 
(in this case domain ontologies) in the solution of different 
problems.
speaker: SYSTEM
